thread.title: Anne Hathaway dotes on pooch as she jets into LA | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Anne Hathaway dotes on pooch as she jets into LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Christine Rendon For Dailymail.Com
title: Anne Hathaway dotes on pooch as she jets into LA | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 128 shares She wore her glossy black hair down, and accessorized the effortlessly stylish look with a pair of tortoise sunglasses and a pendant necklace. Anne's dog appeared to be her pooch Edward, who she and her husband Adam Shulman adopted in 2014. Aww: Anne's dog appeared to be her pooch Edward, who she and her husband Adam Shulman adopted in 2014 The couple also own a chocolate Labrador named Esmeralda. Anne and her husband Adam married in Big Sur, California in 2012 following a 10 month long engagement. They recently welcomed their first child, a son named Jonathan Rosebanks Shulman who will be celebrating his first birthday on March 24. Parting crowds: Travelling in style, Anne wore a pair of black ripped jeans, a white top, and a leather jacket Anne is currently working on a few acting projects. She is set to star in a remake of Dirty Rotten Scoundrels called Nasty Women opposite Rebel Wilson. One of the most anticipated films she is set to star in is Ocean's Eight alongside a whole host of famous faces. The plot is currently being kept under wraps but the film will be released in theaters on June 8. Love story: Hathaway and her husband Adam married in Big Sur, California in 2012 following a 10 month long engagement Share or comment on this article 128
